entry.source: This is Hope. I am pushing for a policy to have{F801}the Samurai equipped with mystic relics.{F801}In an area north of Shibuya is a place called{F801}{F804,5}Harajuku.{F804,0} I have heard that an organization{F801}similar to the Samurai, known as the "police,"{F801}stockpiled them there. Your mission is to retrieve a{F801}large amount of mystic relics known as {F804,5}guns{F804,0} there.{F801}That is all.{F801}
